body_html:
Thanks for this change, it was clearly a lot of work and it would be great to get TF Lite on Windows!

I've asked @mrry for some advice on the float narrowing changes, since he would have had to deal with this for mainline TensorFlow, and without good tests it's likely that doubles will creep back into the code.

I've asked @mrry for some advice on the float narrowing changes, since he would have had to deal with this for mainline TensorFlow, and without good tests it's likely that doubles will creep back into the code.
body:
Thanks for this change, it was clearly a lot of work and it would be great to get TF Lite on Windows!

I've asked @mrry for some advice on the float narrowing changes, since he would have had to deal with this for mainline TensorFlow, and without good tests it's likely that doubles will creep back into the code.
